mn50:11.1: Then those brahmins and householders abused, attacked, harassed, and troubled the ethical mendicants of good character:
mn50:11.2: ‘These baldies, fake ascetics, riffraff, black spawn from the feet of our Kinsman, say, “We practice absorption! We practice absorption!” And they meditate and concentrate and contemplate and ruminate.
mn50:11.3: They’re just like an owl on a branch, which meditates and concentrates and contemplates and ruminates as it hunts a mouse.
